name: Child's Play (super-rains-bros)
description:
A platforming race between two demons that Satan's children have forced into toy cars.

P1 Controls: Left - a; Right -d; Jump - w

P2 Controls: Left - j; Right - l; Jump - i

Start Screen music is "The Scariest Thing About You" by Speck (c) copyright 2017 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/speck/56695 Ft: Martijn de Boer

Gameplay music is "The Toddler's Last Organic Dollar" by Speck (c) copyright 2018 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/speck/58553 Ft: Martijn de Boer, Admiral Bob, Apoxode, Subhashish Panigrahi, panu
